text: 29|29|niṅṅaḷ kāmanivr̥ttikkāyi puruṣanmāruṭe aṭutt cellukayuṁ (prakr̥tiparamāya) mārgaṁ laṅghikkukayuṁ niṅṅaḷuṭe sadas'sil vecc niṣid'dhavr̥tti ceyyukayumāṇēā? appēāḷ addēhattinṟe janata maṟupaṭiyeānnuṁ nalkukayuṇṭāyilla; nī satyavānmāruṭe kūṭṭattilāṇeṅkil ñaṅṅaḷkk allāhuvinṟe śikṣa nī keāṇṭuvā enn avar paṟaññatallāte
